Yanggu County (Yanggu-gun) is a county i: The northern part of Yanggu County was part of the front line for much of the Korean War
and now borders the Demilitarized Zone. Several Korean War battle sites are located in Yanggu County

Yanggu County (Yanggu-gun) is a county i: Yanggu is located in what is claimed to be the geographic center of the Korean peninsula. Dochon-ri village in Nam-myeon in Yanggu is called the "navel of Korea".
